mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM ( SELECT t1.content_id, SUM(t1.count * t2.count) AS dot_product, t3.vector_size, (SUM(t1.count * t2.count) / (t3.vector_size * vector_similar.vector_size)) AS cosine_similar FROM win_cnt_by_tag t1 LEFT JOIN win_cnt_by_tag t2 ON t1.tag_no = t2.tag_no AND t2.content_id = '125266' JOIN ( SELECT content_id, sqrt(SUM(POW(count, 2))) AS vector_size FROM win_cnt_by_tag GROUP BY content_id ) t3 ON t1.content_id = t3.content_id CROSS JOIN ( SELECT sqrt(SUM(POW(count, 2))) AS vector_size FROM win_cnt_by_tag WHERE content_id = #{contentId} ) vector_similar GROUP BY t1.content_id, t3.vector_size, vector_similar.vector_size ORDER BY cosine_similar DESC LIMIT 11 ) subquery INNER JOIN attraction_info a ON subquery.content_id = a.content_id;
